name: ACh Tag Manager
author: ACh

sections.description:
Homepage | Documentation | Support

The ACh Google Tag Manager is a free tool for everyone to manage Global Site Tag (GA4 Measurement ID), Google Tag Manager, and Google Analytics. You can set up Google Analytics 4 property (GA4) with this plugin.

ACh Google Tag Manager Features You’ll Absolutely love

You can set up Google Analytics 4 property (GA4) with this plugin.

The easy way to set GA4 Measurement ID.

The easy way to set Global Site Tag.

The easy way to set Google Tag Manager.

The easy way to set Google Analytics.

Translations

If you want to contribute to the translation, please visit our translation section. We appreciate all the translation help we can get.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->ACh Tag Manager screen to configure the plugin options.
  4. Save settings. It’s done.
sections.faq:
What is Google Analytics 4 property?

Google Analytics 4 (formerly known as “App + Web”) is a new kind of property, with different reports than what you’re used to seeing in Universal Analytics properties. One advantage of a Google Analytics 4 property is that you can use it for a website, an app, or both a website and app together. Universal Analytics properties only support websites. Read the announcement to learn more. Please see here for more information.

What happens if I disable the plugin?

If you disable the plugin all its features will also be disabled.

Release Date: March 20th, 2021

  • IMPROVEMENT: Separated the Universal Google Analytics and Measurement ID to the new field.

1.0.0

Release Date: March 19th, 2021

  • Initial release.
